content: the extremely popular mtoto baby overalls - now in adult sizes these woolen overalls are guaranteed to keep you warm even here in finland super easy top-down pattern anyone can make these these overalls begin flat from the top the upper front and back are knitted separately then they are joined together in the round and the body is knitted seamlessly top-down attach buttons or buckles weave in ends and wear your new adult overalls with pride mzima overalls in danish https //strikkeglad dk/47743/mzima-overalls/ 02/18/2024 note the model in the photo is wearing size 3 which is two sizes down of her usual size the overalls are loose-fit if don t choose a smaller size also thank you for all the love & support i m overwhelmed by all the kind messages and comments i ve got since publishing this yesterday remember to tag me also on instagram @kiukkulintu because i d love to see your projects there too
